hymn.title: The spirit of man is the lamp of Jehovah

layout.singingstanza: The spir -- it of man is the lamp of Je -- ho -- vah, search -- ing all the in -- ner -- most parts of the in -- ner be -- ing. The spir -- it of be -- ing. The spir -- it of man is the lamp of Je -- ho -- vah, The spir -- it of man is the lamp of Je -- ho -- vah, The spir -- it of man...

lyrics.stanza: The spirit of man Is the lamp of Jehovah, Searching all the innermost parts Of the inner being. (repeat)
The spirit of man Is the lamp of Jehovah, The spirit of man Is the lamp of Jehovah, The spirit of man...
